argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cofuval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | cofuval.f | |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) |
| 3 |  | cofuval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. ( D Func E ) ) |
| 4 |  | cofu2nd.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_cofu1st | |- ( ph -> ( 1st ` ( G o.func F ) ) = ( ( 1st ` G ) o. ( 1st ` F ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` ( G o.func F ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( 1st ` G ) o. ( 1st ` F ) ) ` X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` D ) = ( Base ` D ) |
| 8 |  | #P_relfunc | |- Rel ( C Func D ) |
| 9 |  | #P_1st2ndbr | |- ( ( Rel ( C Func D ) /\ F e. ( C Func D ) ) -> ( 1st ` F ) ( C Func D ) ( 2nd ` F ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 2, 9 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ph -> ( 1st ` F ) ( C Func D ) ( 2nd ` F ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 7, 10 | #P_funcf1 | |- ( ph -> ( 1st ` F ) : B --> ( Base ` D ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fvco3 | |- ( ( ( 1st ` F ) : B --> ( Base ` D ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( ( 1st ` G ) o. ( 1st ` F ) ) ` X ) = ( ( 1st ` G ) ` ( ( 1st ` F ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 4, 12 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( 1st ` G ) o. ( 1st ` F ) ) ` X ) = ( ( 1st ` G ) ` ( ( 1st ` F ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` ( G o.func F ) ) ` X ) = ( ( 1st ` G ) ` ( ( 1st ` F ) ` X ) ) ) |
